ygData.subject: RE: A tale of woe.
ygData.msgSnippet: HQ bear pelts are low % drop on a number of bears (notably kodiacs).  I ve seen at least a dozen.  I could kick myself for selling them to the vendors then
ygData.messageBody:
HQ bear pelts are low % drop on a number of bears (notably kodiacs). I've
seen at least a dozen. I could kick myself for selling them to the vendors
then since I've seen them go for 50 plat a pop these days.

-----Original Message-----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Heh heh, I'm with ya in spirit man! I'd say though that tailors too would
dearly love to find a source of HQ wolf pelts to outfit all those halfling
druids with reinforced leather. I've seen one in all my lifetimes!
